education.institution: Vishwakarma Institute of Information Technology, Pune

projects.name: Mindful Browsing (Chrome Extension)
projects.description: Built a Chrome extension that delays access to distracting sites using fullscreen modals.

projects.name: ADC-Based Audio Analyzer
projects.description: Captured real-time audio via mic input; processed signal using FFT in Python and visualized time/frequency data.

projects.name: Reserve Spot (Web App)
projects.description: Created a dynamic parking slot booking system with interactive grid UI and localStorage-based booking persistence.

projects.name: Text-to-Speech Converter
projects.description: Built a real-time text-to-speech tool using FreeTTS with a basic GUI for input/output interaction.

projects.name: Stock Price Visualizer
projects.description: Built a GUI to fetch and plot Indian stock prices with real-time filters and dynamic charts.

achievements.name: Radar Sensor
achievements.description: Co-authored a paper on a low-cost radar prototype using Arduino and ultrasonic sensors.
